name: Sujay Industries
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1994, at Pune (Maharashtra, India), we “Sujay Industries, Chakan” are known as the prominent Manufacturer and Supplier of a comprehensive assortment of Boiler Components. These components are manufactured using the best grade raw material and advanced technology. Apart from these, the offered components are designed with high precision in order to meet the set industrial standards.

Infrastructure: We are supported by a large infrastructure unit for the production of our extensive range of products. Our state-of-the-art plant spreads over a large area and has all the necessary machinery and ultra modern equipment.

Quality: We offer our valuable clients a high quality array of products that is manufactured using high grade raw material and advanced technology in our well-developed manufacturing unit. At our organization, the entire production process is strictly monitored by our expert quality analysts who have in-depth knowledge in this domain.

Our Team: Our team of highly experienced and innovative engineers and technicians are involved in manufacturing and supplying a qualitative assortment of Boiler Components. To enhance the quality of all the products, our quality analysts have implemented the most appropriate quality standards in the production process.

Why Us?: Our organization is recognized as the leading manufacturer and supplier of a qualitative assortment of Boiler Components, Heavy Fabrication & Blasting Painting.
